Name: Viridite Noonwood
Desc: A tall and luscious tree bearing a crown of green. As its wood is hard as steel, many structures use it to bear heavy loads. It is even used as the main material in making weapon shafts. Thus did it earn the name "Viridite."\nThis Viridite tree of sprawling green has entered full maturity and can be harvested and used to its fullest extent.
